trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The BindingCompleteEventArgs contains information regarding exceptions or errors that occurred during a binding process.
trans-unit.target: O BindingCompleteEventArgs contém informações sobre as exceções ou erros que ocorreram durante um processo de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state, and binding context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o enlace especificado, o estado de erro e o contexto de enlace.

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`Indica se o processo de enlace foi concluída com êxito ou Ocorreu um erro ou de uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`Indica se o erro ocorreu ao atualizar o controlo vinculado ou a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O enlace associado esta ocorrência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, and binding context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o enlace especificado, o estado de erro e o texto e o contexto de enlace.

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`Indica se o processo de enlace foi concluída com êxito ou Ocorreu um erro ou de uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`Indica se o erro ocorreu ao atualizar o controlo vinculado ou a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O enlace associado esta ocorrência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: A exceção de texto ou mensagem de erro para erros que ocorreram durante o enlace.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, and exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o enlace especificado, o estado de erro e texto, contexto de enlace e exceção.

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`Indica se o processo de enlace foi concluída com êxito ou Ocorreu um erro ou de uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`Indica se o erro ocorreu ao atualizar o controlo vinculado ou a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O enlace associado esta ocorrência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: A exceção de texto ou mensagem de erro para erros que ocorreram durante o enlace.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que ocorreu durante o enlace.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, exception, and whether the binding should be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o enlace especificado, o estado de erro e texto, contexto de enlace, exceções, e se o enlace ' foi cancelado.

trans-unit.source: `state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: `state`Indica se o processo de enlace foi concluída com êxito ou Ocorreu um erro ou de uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: `context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
trans-unit.target: `context`Indica se o erro ocorreu ao atualizar o controlo vinculado ou a origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O enlace associado esta ocorrência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: A exceção de texto ou mensagem de erro para erros que ocorreram durante o enlace.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que ocorreu durante o enlace.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the binding and keep focus on the current control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow focus to shift to another control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para cancelar o enlace e mantenha o foco no controlo atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para permitir o foco deslocar para outro controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o enlace associado esta ocorrência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The Binding might also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> or of a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete>eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>ou de uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> o enlace

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the direction of the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a direção da operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the completion state of the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado de conclusão da operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Use the BindingCompleteState to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o BindingCompleteState para determinar se o enlace foi concluída com êxito ou Ocorreu um erro ou de uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a descrição de texto de erro ocorrido durante a operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve uma cadeia vazia se nenhum erro ocorreu na operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: It returns the value of the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o valor da <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade quando ocorre uma exceção.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: A descrição de texto do erro ocorrido durante a operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que ocorreram durante a operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve `null` se não ocorreu uma exceção durante a operação de enlace.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that occurred during the binding operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que ocorreu durante a operação de enlace.</xref:System.Exception>
